/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with bare trees, their leafless branches reaching towards the clear blue sky, suggesting a winter or early spring day. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. In the distance, a white building with a gray roof stands out, its architecture hinting at the city's blend of traditional and modern styles. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and the building, adding depth and perspective to the scene.
